author: Tim Daniels
title: Heat Partnering with 2 Organizations for Share-a-Meal Campaign Amid COVID-19
description: The  Miami Heat   announced  a partnership with Lineage Logistics and Feeding America on Thursday to raise awareness for the Share-A-Meal campaign, which is aiming to provide 100 million meals to families amid the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
Wilfredo Lee/Associated Press
